Average PTA income per student by community board in the 2018-19 school year

Each dot represents a dollar raised by the PTA

CB7 (Upper West Side)

$1228

per

student

CB9 (West Harlem)

PTAs in CB7 raised enough money to provide over $1200 in funding for every student, while CB9 and CB10 PTAs provided enough for only 7.4 percent and 2.9 percent of that amount, respectively, to each student.

$91 per student

CB10 (Central Harlem)

$35 per student

Graphic by Devon Campbell, Andrew Park
